求欧洲贵族的头衔 - 貂皮 - 博客大巴 ...  女侯爵 marchioness 女伯爵 comtesse.

list.abs: marchini 马奇尼, marchio 马尔基奥, marchini 马尔基尼

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from medieval Latin marchionissa, feminine of marchio(n-) 'ruler of a border territory', from marcha 'march' (see march)

entry.def: A marchioness is the wife of a marquis, or a woman with the same rank as a marquis.

means.word_mean: 1. the wife or widow of a marquis
2. a noblewoman ranking below a duchess and above a countess
